Item ID22601

Stony basalt is an item that can be used to teleport to the Troll Stronghold entrance, below the climbing rocks shortcut. The stony basalt is consumed when it is used to teleport. It may only be used after completing Making Friends with My Arm.

To create stony basalt, players must use 1 basalt with 3 urt salt and 1 te salt.

A player teleporting to the Troll Stronghold via the use of stony basalt.

With level 73 Agility and the completion of the Hard Fremennik Diary, the teleport destination is changed to be on the Stronghold roof, past the climbing rocks shortcut.

This teleport can be incorporated into a portal within a Portal Chamber using 100 times the required resources (300 urt salt, 100 te salt, and 100 basalt), or in a Portal Nexus using 1,000 times the required resources (3000 urt salt, 1000 te salt, and 1000 basalt).

Creation[edit | edit source]

Requirements

  1. ↑ All are created in 1 tick

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • If you attempt to use the item while you are standing on the teleport destination in the Troll Stronghold, the teleport will fail and you will receive the message "You are already here. You don't want to burn to ashes then reconstitute, just to travel to the same place do you?".

[[File:Stony basalt detail.png|left|180px]]
'''Stony basalt''' is an item that can be used to teleport to the [[Troll Stronghold (location)|Troll Stronghold]] entrance, below the climbing rocks [[shortcut]]. The stony basalt is consumed when it is used to teleport. It may only be used after completing [[Making Friends with My Arm]].

To create stony basalt, players must use 1 [[basalt]] with 3 [[urt salt]] and 1 [[te salt]].
[[File:Stony basalt teleport.gif|left|thumb|160px|A player teleporting to the Troll Stronghold via the use of stony basalt.]]
With level 73 [[Agility]] and the completion of the [[Hard Fremennik Diary]], the teleport destination is changed to be on the Stronghold roof, past the climbing rocks [[shortcut]].

This teleport can be incorporated into a portal within a [[Portal Chamber]] using 100 times the required resources (300 urt salt, 100 te salt, and 100 basalt), or in a [[Portal Nexus]] using 1,000 times the required resources (3000 urt salt, 1000 te salt, and 1000 basalt).
==Creation==
{{Recipe
|notes = {{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Making Friends with My Arm]]
|members = Yes
|ticks = 1
|ticksnote = All are created in 1 tick
|mat1 = Basalt
|mat2 = Urt salt
|mat2quantity = 3
|mat3 = Te salt
|output1 = Stony basalt
}}
== Trivia ==
* If you attempt to use the item while you are standing on the teleport destination in the [[Troll Stronghold (location)|Troll Stronghold]], the teleport will fail and you will receive the message "You are already here. You don't want to burn to ashes then reconstitute, just to travel to the same place do you?".
